original_title: Imported milk powder prices to be reduced from tomorrow
original_body_lines: Colombo, April 24 (Daily Mirror) - Milk powder importers announced a reduction in the selling price of imported milk powder with effect from tomorrow.
As a result, the retail price of a kilogram packet of milk powder will be reduced by between Rs. 250 and Rs. 300.
Additionally, the selling price of a 400-gram milk powder packet will be lowered by between Rs. 100 and Rs. 130.
